package.name: HTML_QuickForm_Renderer_Tableless
package.summary: A replacement for the default renderer that uses only XHTML and CSS but no table tags
package.notes: - Bug #8385: another change for XHTML validity: if a label is empty, ' ' will be used as the label (thanks to Laurent Laville, pear at laurent-laville dot org) - Request #8389: use a CSS class for the formatting of the required mark in the element template instead of a hard-coded color; this allows to change the color of the required mark via a stylesheet; the example stylesheet was extended accordingly (form span.required) (thanks to Laurent Laville, pear at laurent-laville dot org) - the example file was extended and corrected to be fully XHTML valid
